classDiagram
  class AttributeNode {
    \_\_attributes : dict[str, AttributeTypes]
    attributes : ItemsView[str, AttributeTypes]
    \_\_init\_\_(name: str, node_type: NodeType)* None
    add_attribute(key: str, value: AttributeTypes)
    add_attributes()
    clear_attributes() None
    get_attribute(key: str) AttributeTypes
    memory_bytes() int
    remove_attribute(key: str) None
    update_attribute(key: str, value: AttributeTypes) None
    update_attributes()
  }
  style AttributeNode fill:#77AADD
  class BaseNode {
    \_\_name : str
    \_\_node_type
    name : str
    type : NodeType
    \_\_init\_\_(name: str, node_type: NodeType)* None
    memory_bytes() int
  }
  style BaseNode fill:#77AADD
  class DataNode {
    \_\_data
    data : Tensor
    \_\_init\_\_(name: str, data: Tensor | None)
    memory_bytes() int
  }
  style DataNode fill:#77AADD
  class GroupNode {
    \_\_init\_\_(name: str)
  }
  style GroupNode fill:#77AADD
  class NodeType {
    name
  }
  style NodeType fill:#77AADD
  class RootNode {
    \_\_init\_\_()
  }
  style RootNode fill:#77AADD
  AttributeNode --|> BaseNode
  DataNode --|> AttributeNode
  GroupNode --|> AttributeNode
  RootNode --|> BaseNode
  NodeType --o BaseNode : \_\_node_type
